title: Phyto-pharmacological and computational profiling of Bombax ceiba Linn. Leaves revealed pharmacological properties against oxidation, hyperglycemia, pain, and diarrhea
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Mohammad Abdullah Taher, Md. Jamal Hossain, Miss Sharmin Zahan, Mohammad Mahmudul Hasan, Jannatul Ferdous, Asheka Rahman, Mala Khan, Md. Khalid Hosain, Mohammad A. Rashid
